Feb. 25, 2012 D Valley Entertainment Contest (Second Grade Brass)
Valley Entertainment Contest (Second Grade Brass) 20 Entertainments Contest Valley Entertainment Contest valley-entertainment-contest-2nd-grade-brass
Valley Hotel, Fivemiletown, County Tyrone, Northern Ireland, UK Most Entertaining: Roughan Silver Band Best March: The Young Salvationist, Ballyduff Silver Best Soloist: Ashley Elliott - Xylophone, Roughan Silver
*The band with the highest Music placing was awarded first place*
